bibl.title: On Stylistical and Technical Components of the Roman Coloured Bone Appliques from Egypt.
bibl.note: The state of research on the late Roman multicoloured bone appliques attributed to Alexandrian workshops.

bibl.title: Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano

bibl.seg: RODZIEWICZ Elzbieta, On Stylistical and Technical Components of the Roman Coloured Bone Appliques from Egypt.

Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano (Roma, 1995) pp. 405-411 et pl. 75.
The state of research on the late Roman multicoloured bone appliques attributed to Alexandrian workshops.
